item.title: About
item.description: This small static website (built with blogdown and hugo) is a simple collection of ideas I (Ewen Corre) have. The idea followed the visit of a very similar website of the same type, created by Roel Hogervorst. As far as I know, he didn’t invent the concept either, he did the same as Sean Kross. I hope this experiment will be funny and useful!

item.title: First thought
item.description: With this short note I start my *dump of thoughts”, like Dumbledore’s Pensine. See About page for more info.
